message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will significantly benefit your business. Considering its value to you, I propose an initial price of $1300000. Let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. This is a significant investment for me, and I need to make sure it's worth it.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Given the value of the product to you, I am willing to negotiate at $1250000. I hope this proposal better aligns with your expectations and budget.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1200000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
